description: Maximal elements of pairs of "(-1)sigma amicable numbers", sorted by their minimal elements.
formula: (-1)sigma(a) = (-1)sigma(b) = a+b where a<b. Here (-1)sigma(n) = A049060(n): If n = Product p(i)^r(i) then (-1)sigma(n) = Product(-1+Sum p(i)^s, s=1 to r(i)). This sequence gives the values of b; A051595 gives the values of a.
author: _Yasutoshi Kohmoto_
